verses.text: And it came to pass at the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, wherein \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

That the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* had \w restored|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* them, and caused the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* there.
And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Hamath-zobah|strong="H2578"\w*, and \w prevailed|strong="H2388"\w* against it.

And he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Tadmor|strong="H8412"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and all the \w store|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, which he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*.

Also he \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w*, and \w Beth-horon|strong="H1032"\w* the \w nether|strong="H8481"\w*, \w fenced|strong="H4692"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, with \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*;

And \w Baalath|strong="H1191"\w*, and all the \w store|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had, and all the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and all that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w desired|strong="H2836"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and throughout all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of his \w dominion|strong="H4475"\w*.\f + \fr 8.6 \ft all that…: Heb. all the desire of Solomon which he desired to build\f*

¶ \add As for\add* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that were\add* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, which \add were\add* not of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

\add But\add* of their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, who were \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, whom the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* not, them did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* make to \w pay|strong="H5927"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4522"\w* until this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

But of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* no \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* for his \w work|strong="H4399"\w*; but they \add were\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of his \w captains|strong="H7991"\w*, and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of his \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*.

And these \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w officers|strong="H5324"\w*, \add even\add* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, that bare \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that he had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for her: for he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* shall not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because \add the places are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, whereunto the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 8.11 \ft holy: Heb. holiness\f*

¶ Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he had \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*,

Even after a certain \w rate|strong="H1697"\w* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* according to the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, on the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and on the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and on the solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \add even\add* in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, and in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w weeks|strong="H7620"\w*, and in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of \w tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w*.

¶ And he \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w*, according to the \w order|strong="H4941"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* to their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to their \w charges|strong="H4931"\w*, to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* and \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* before the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, as the \w duty|strong="H1697"\w* of every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w required|strong="H3117"\w*: the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w* also by their \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* at every \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: for so had \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w*.\f + \fr 8.14 \ft so had David…: Heb. so was the commandment of David the man of God\f*

And they \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* not from the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* concerning any \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, or concerning the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*.

Now all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* was \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* unto the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w foundation|strong="H4143"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and until it was \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*. \add So\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w perfected|strong="H8003"\w*.

¶ Then \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w Ezion-geber|strong="H6100"\w*, and to \w Eloth|strong="H0359"\w*, at the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H8193"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.\f + \fr 8.17 \ft Eloth: also called, Elath\f*

And \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him by the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w ships|strong="H0591"\w*, and \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that had \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* with the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* to \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* thence \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.
